title: Global stocks and US futures move higher on coronavirus optimism
title_page: Global stocks and US futures move higher on coronavirus optimism - CNN
maintext:
New York/London (CNN Business) Global stocks and US futures advanced on Tuesday on hopes that the coronavirus crisis may be easing in some of the places that have been hit hardest.
Hang Seng HSI Shanghai Composite SHCOMP Japan's Nikkei advanced 2%, while Hong Kong'sadded 2.1%. China'sincreased 2% as investors returned from a holiday. In Europe, benchmark indexes in Paris, Frankfurt and London opened with gains of more than 3%.
Dow INDU S&P 500 SPX Nasdaq COMP futures were up 3.1%, or 690 points, suggesting the index could move higher again after closing with a 7.7% gain on Monday.futures added 2.7% andfutures increased 2.5%.
There are indications the pandemic may be easing in Italy and Spain, and New York Governor Andrew Cuomo said Monday that daily deaths caused by the coronavirus in his state have been "effectively flat for two days." China recorded no new deaths from the virus on Monday for the first time since late January.
